about_the_game:
Game Overview

TimexDrifter is an intense 2D action-platformer with a retro-modern vibe, blending the fast-paced combat of Mega Man X with the strategic depth of fighting games. Take control of three unique heroes: JJ, Melody, and Abdul as they fight their way through a series of thrilling levels to dismantle the sinister organization T.H.E.M. The game combines stunning pixel art with high-resolution cutscenes and a killer soundtrack featuring legendary composers like Manami Matsumae (Mega Man, Shovel Knight). Ready to dive into an adventure that’s old-school yet fresh?

Features

  • Classic Side-Scrolling Action: Battle through carefully crafted levels filled with challenging enemies and intense boss fights.

  • Three Playable Characters: Choose between JJ, Melody, and Abdul, each with unique abilities, attacks, and gameplay styles.

  • Modern Combat Mechanics: Utilize double jumps, dashes, and air combos in a freestyle combo system, combining normal and special attacks.

  • Retro & Modern Fusion: Experience a game that balances nostalgic pixel art with high-res story scenes.

Gameplay & Mechanics

  • Stage Styles: Run, jump, and blast your way through dynamic stages, including a thrilling hoverbike sequence.

  • Freestyle Combat: Mix up normal and special attacks to unleash powerful combos. Each character brings their own style, whether it’s JJ’s agile double jumps, Melody’s long-range attacks, or Abdul’s powerhouse punches.

  • Fighting Styles: Choose from three distinct styles to match your playstyle:

    • Balanced Style: A well-rounded choice for beginners. Getting damaged increases the special meter, allowing for more frequent special attacks.

    • Brute Style: Embrace a more aggressive approach, diving into enemies with brute force. Taking hits fills the special meter faster, making it perfect for players who like a relentless offensive style.

    • Technical Style: Specialize in skillful, strategic play. This style increases your points for skill upgrades but reduces your basic attack power. Perfect for players who favor special moves and building high scores.

  • Upgradeable Skills: The game features a unique skills upgrade system. Instead of traditional XP or tokens, TimexDrifter introduces a scoring points system. The more combos you land without taking damage, the higher your score multiplier. Use your accumulated points to buy new skills, boost your damage, or even heal at in-stage "Upgrade Terminals."

Story & Setting

Welcome to Fortis, a futuristic world under the grip of T.H.E.M. Join our heroes as they uncover secrets, face challenging foes, and strive to liberate their world. Meet:

  • JJ: The agile “Time Drifter” with rapid combo moves.

  • Melody: A former idol with powerful ranged attacks and unmatched hoverbike skills.

  • Abdul: The powerhouse with a metal arm that enhances his strength, making him a formidable tank in battle.

Each character brings unique strengths, making them essential for the journey to free Fortis from tyranny.

Enemies & Bosses

Battle your way through diverse stages like Sunset City, Orgatek Jungle, and Molten Core. Each stage features a unique boss with its own story and fighting style, adding depth and challenge to every encounter.

Soundtrack

The soundtrack is a gem, featuring contributions from Manami Matsumae, ClaireBun, and Pianotoko. Expect music that enhances every moment, from intense battles to atmospheric exploration.

Current Demo Build

The demo lets you experience:

  • Playable Characters: JJ and Melody

  • First Stages: Take on the early levels and get a taste of the game’s story and world.

  • Intro Cinematics & Cutscenes: Dive into the story with beautifully crafted scenes.
